sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>When a VIP caller is raising an incidnet, the notification will be send to the specific group</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>approved</approval> <assigned_to/> <assignment_group display_value="Hikon Professional Services" name="Hikon Professional Services">0ea124de4f6463007e72aa95d310c750</assignment_group> <category display_value="Incident">c99d05924f2863007e72aa95d310c7b0</category> <company display_value="GB3">b771e09e4f6463007e72aa95d310c784</company> <description>When: An incident is logged & caller is VIP Whom: VIP Notification group (GB3 to provide the name of the group) What: To be provided</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 00:25:00</estimated_hours> <notes/> <number>TAS0001107</number> <package display_value="PACK0001015">ad90a6b24f60e3007e72aa95d310c7c7</package> <short_description>Notifications - ticket logged for VIP</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>New</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-20 21:29:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0080cea34fe423007e72aa95d310c773</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>rachel.rowlandson@gb3.co.uk</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-24 08:47:56</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
